attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned would like the Prime Minister to remove the E-Petition service. The E-Petition service diverts people from their work and this makes the British economy much less competitive. The service also costs taxpayers money which could be better spent on more important things such as MPs expenses.

We believe that the Prime Minister knows best and the E-Petition service serves no useful function.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
